name: opentelemetry
description: OpenTelemetry is a distributed tracing and stats collection framework.

scripts.precompile: lerna run version && npm run submodule
scripts.compile: lerna run protos:generate && tsc --build tsconfig.json tsconfig.esm.json tsconfig.esnext.json
scripts.postinstall: npm run update-ts-configs && npm run bootstrap
scripts.submodule: git submodule sync --recursive && git submodule update --init --recursive
scripts.docs:test: linkinator docs --silent --retry && linkinator doc/*.md --skip http://localhost:3000 --skip http://localhost:9464 --silent --retry
scripts.reset: lerna clean -y && rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm run compile && npm run lint:fix
scripts.comment_prepare_1: echo scripts in this section automatically prepare releases. Intended for use by maintainers only.
scripts.comment_prepare_2: echo experimental preparation scripts only prepare experimental packages
scripts.prepare_release:experimental:patch: npm run _check:no_changes && npm run _backup:lerna && npm run _lerna:remove_api && npm run _lerna:remove_stable && npm run _lerna:version_patch && npm run _restore:lerna
scripts.prepare_release:experimental:minor: npm run _check:no_changes && npm run _backup:lerna && npm run _lerna:remove_api && npm run _lerna:remove_stable && npm run _lerna:version_minor && npm run _restore:lerna
scripts.comment_prepare_3: echo sdk preparation scripts prepare all stable and experimental packages
scripts.prepare_release:sdk:patch: npm run _check:no_changes && npm run _backup:lerna && npm run _lerna:remove_api && npm run _lerna:version_patch && npm run _restore:lerna
scripts.prepare_release:sdk:minor: npm run _check:no_changes && npm run _backup:lerna && npm run _lerna:remove_api && npm run _lerna:version_minor && npm run _restore:lerna
scripts.comment_internal: echo scripts below this line are for internal use
scripts._check:no_changes: if [ ! -z "$(git status -uall --porcelain)" ]; then echo Please ensure all changes are committed; exit 1; fi

author: OpenTelemetry Authors
